actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-414.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 5646, a bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to require ConRail to make premium payments under certain medical and life insurance policies, to provide that ConRail shall be entitled to a loan under section 211(h) of such act in an amount required for such premium payments, and to provide that such premium payments shall be deemed to be expenses of administration of the respective railroads in reorganization.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5646 (Railroad reorganization amendments).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 5646, a bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to require ConRail to make premium payments under certain medical and life insurance policies, to provide that ConRail shall be entitled to a loan under section 211(h) of such act in an amount required for such premium payments, and to provide that such premium payments shall be deemed to be expenses of administration of the respective railroads in reorganization.
